review: I really didn't expect much from this, but the You Tube app on my DVD player had gone away so I thought I would give this a shot.  While I haven't investigated this fully yet, I am very pleased with the way it works with Netflix.  I had a lot of trouble streaming Netflix due to slower Internet speed in the evenings.  This lets me watch Netflix all evening without any slowdowns or re-buffering.  Well worth the price!
